nodes.text: The fin-headed species was a sentient species in the galaxy.
This species was bipedal in form, with green skin. Its most notable feature was a narrow fin-like protrusion extending from the top of its head and extending backwards. It had yellow eyes.

One member of this species lived on Junkfort Station in the Outer Rim Territories. This station banned bounty hunters, but when Han Solo visited the station while searching for a power gem, this individual and his Human companion decided to try and capture Solo and claim his bounty from Jabba Desilijic Tiure the Hutt. Solo, however, realized their plan and avoided their initial blaster shot. Engaging in a brawl with the Corellian smuggler, the fin-headed individual was about to overpower him when Solo's Wookiee companion Chewbacca joined the fight and overpowered Solo's assailants.

Another fin-headed individual lived on Antipose where Raskar, a former member of the Pirates of Iridium, was hosting a gladiatorial contest for a power gem. When Solo and Chewbacca arrived on the planet, this individual watched as Chewbacca fought the leading contender in a courtyard outside of the official tournament arena.
